00014 bool read_grid(const char* name, grid_type* data)
00015 {
00016   std::ifstream file;
00017   std::istream* in = 0;
00018   if (!name || stricmp(name, "CON") == 0 || stricmp(name, "CON$") == 0 \
00019     || stricmp(name, "CON:") == 0 || stricmp(name, "CONIN$") == 0)
00020   {
00021     if (-1 == _setmode(_fileno(stdin), _O_BINARY))
00022     {
00023       std::cerr << "cannot set binary mode for standard input stream\n";
00024       return false;
00025     }
00026     in = &std::cin;
00027   }
00028   else
00029   {
00030     file.open(name, std::ios::binary);
00031     if (!file)
00032     {
00033       std::cerr << "failed to open grid file\n";
00034       return false;
00035     }
00036     in = &file;
00037   }
00038 
00039   char ch[4];
00040   if (!in->read(ch, sizeof(ch)))
00041   {
00042     return false;
00043   }
00044   if (strncmp(ch, "DSBB", 4) == 0)
00045   {
00046     if (!in->read((char*) &data->cx, sizeof(data->cx)))
00047     {
00048       return false;
00049     }
00050     if (!in->read((char*) &data->cy, sizeof(data->cy)))
00051     {
00052       return false;
00053     }
00054     if (!in->read((char*) &data->x1, sizeof(data->x1)))
00055     {
00056       return false;
00057     }
00058     if (!in->read((char*) &data->x2, sizeof(data->x2)))
00059     {
00060       return false;
00061     }
00062     if (!in->read((char*) &data->y1, sizeof(data->y1)))
00063     {
00064       return false;
00065     }
00066     if (!in->read((char*) &data->y2, sizeof(data->y2)))
00067     {
00068       return false;
00069     }
00070     if (!in->read((char*) &data->z1, sizeof(data->z1)))
00071     {
00072       return false;
00073     }
00074     if (!in->read((char*) &data->z2, sizeof(data->z2)))
00075     {
00076       return false;
00077     }
00078     int nn = data->cx * data->cy;
00079     data->zz = new float[nn];
00080     if (!in->read((char*) data->zz, nn * sizeof(float)))
00081     {
00082       return false;
00083     }
00084   }
00085   else if (strncmp(ch, "DSAA", 4) == 0)
00086   {
00087     if (*in >> data->cx >> data->cy >> data->x1 >> data->x2 >> \
00088       data->y1 >> data->y2 >> data->z1 >> data->z2)
00089     {
00090       int nn = data->cx * data->cy;
00091       data->zz = new float[nn];
00092       int n = std::copy(std::istream_iterator<float>(*in), \
00093           std::istream_iterator<float>(), data->zz) - data->zz;
00094       if (n == nn)
00095       {
00096         return true;
00097       }
00098     }
00099     return false;
00100   }
00101   else if (strncmp(ch, "DSRB", 4) == 0)
00102   {
00103     long nn;
00104     if (!in->read((char*) &nn, sizeof(nn)) || nn != 4)
00105     {
00106       return false;
00107     }
00108     long ver;
00109     if (!in->read((char*) &ver, sizeof(ver)) || ver != 1)
00110     {
00111       return false;
00112     }
00113     if (!in->read((char*) ch, sizeof(ch)) || strncmp(ch, "GRID", 4) != 0)
00114     {
00115       return false;
00116     }
00117     if (!in->read((char*) &nn, sizeof(nn)) || nn != 9*8)
00118     {
00119       return false;
00120     }
00121     long cy;
00122     if (!in->read((char*) &cy, sizeof(cy)))
00123     {
00124       return false;
00125     }
00126     data->cy = (short) cy;
00127 
00128     long cx;
00129     if (!in->read((char*) &cx, sizeof(cx)))
00130     {
00131       return false;
00132     }
00133     data->cx = (short) cx;
00134 
00135     if (!in->read((char*) &data->x1, sizeof(data->x1)))
00136     {
00137       return false;
00138     }
00139     if (!in->read((char*) &data->y1, sizeof(data->y1)))
00140     {
00141       return false;
00142     }
00143     double dx;
00144     if (!in->read((char*) &dx, sizeof(dx)))
00145     {
00146       return false;
00147     }
00148     data->x2 = data->x1 + dx * (data->cx-1);
00149 
00150     double dy;
00151     if (!in->read((char*) &dy, sizeof(dy)))
00152     {
00153       return false;
00154     }
00155     data->y2 = data->y1 + dy * (data->cy-1);
00156 
00157     if (!in->read((char*) &data->z1, sizeof(data->z1)))
00158     {
00159       return false;
00160     }
00161     if (!in->read((char*) &data->z2, sizeof(data->z2)))
00162     {
00163       return false;
00164     }
00165     double rot;
00166     if (!in->read((char*) &rot, sizeof(rot)))
00167     {
00168       return false;
00169     }
00170     double bln;
00171     if (!in->read((char*) &bln, sizeof(bln)))
00172     {
00173       return false;
00174     }
00175     if (!in->read(ch, sizeof(ch)) || strncmp(ch, "DATA", 4) != 0)
00176     {
00177       return false;
00178     }
00179     if (!in->read((char*) &nn, sizeof(nn)) || nn != (long) (cx * cy * sizeof(double)))
00180     {
00181       return false;
00182     }
00183     nn = cx * cy;
00184     data->zz = new float[nn];
00185     for (int i = 0; i < nn; ++i)
00186     {
00187       double z;
00188       if (!in->read((char*) &z, sizeof(z)))
00189       {
00190         return false;
00191       }
00192       data->zz[i] = (float) z;
00193     }
00194   }
00195   else
00196   {
00197     return false;
00198   }
00199   return true;
00200 }
00201 
00202 void histeq(int n_data, const float* data, int n_level, float* level)
00203 {
00204   int i, *pp = new int[n_data];
00205   float* zz = new float[n_data];
00206   float *z = zz;
00207   for (i = 0; i < n_data; ++i)
00208   {
00209     float d = data[i];
00210     if (!_isnan(d))
00211       *z++ = d;
00212   }
00213   n_data = (z - zz);
00214   // std::copy(data, data+n_data, zz);
00215   std::sort(zz, zz+n_data);
00216   int np = 0;
00217   pp[np] = 1;
00218   for (i = 1; i < n_data; ++i)
00219   {
00220     if (zz[i] != zz[np])
00221     {
00222       ++np;
00223       zz[np] = zz[i];
00224       pp[np] = 1;
00225     }
00226     else
00227     {
00228       ++pp[np];
00229     }
00230   }
00231   ++np;
00232   std::partial_sum(pp, pp+np, pp);
00233   float *ff = new float[np-1];
00234   for (i = 0; i < np-1; ++i)
00235   {
00236     // ff[i] = (float) pp[i] / n_data;
00237     ff[i] = (float) pp[i] / n_data;
00238   }
00239   level[0] = zz[0];
00240   for (i = 1; i < n_level-1; ++i)
00241   {
00242     float p = (float) i / n_level;
00243     assert(ff[0] <= p && p <= ff[np-2]);
00244     int n = std::lower_bound(ff, ff+np-1, p) - ff;
00245     if (p < ff[n])
00246     {
00247       float f0 = (n > 0? ff[n-1]: 0.0f);
00248       level[i] = zz[n] + (zz[n+1] - zz[n]) * (p - f0) / (ff[n] - f0);
00249     }
00250     else
00251     {
00252       level[i] = zz[n];
00253     }
00254   }
00255   level[i] = zz[np-1];
00256   delete[] ff;
00257   delete[] zz;
00258   delete[] pp;
00259 }
00260 
00261 bool sub(grid_type* g1, grid_type* g2, grid_type* g3)
00262 {
00263   if (g1->cx != g2->cx || g1->cy != g2->cy || g1->x1 != g2->x1 || g1->y1 != g2->y1
00264     || g1->x2 != g2->x2 || g1->y2 != g2->y2)
00265     return false;
00266 
00267   g3->cx = g1->cx;
00268   g3->cy = g1->cy;
00269   g3->x1 = g1->x1;
00270   g3->y1 = g1->y1;
00271   g3->x2 = g1->x2;
00272   g3->y2 = g1->y2;
00273   
00274   int nn = g1->cx * g1->cy;
00275   g3->zz = new float[nn];
00276   std::transform(g2->zz, g2->zz+nn, g1->zz, g3->zz, std::minus<float>());
00277   g3->z1 = *std::min_element(g3->zz, g3->zz+nn);
00278   g3->z2 = *std::max_element(g3->zz, g3->zz+nn);
00279   return true;
00280 }

00284 void main()
00285 {
00286   grid_type g;
00287   g.zz = 0;
00288   if (!read_grid("d:\\dat\\depth-to-top.grd", &g))
00289   {
00290     std::cerr << "failed to load data\n";
00291     delete[] g.zz;
00292     return;
00293   }
00294 
00295   psstream out("zz.ps");
00296   out.selectmedia(psstream::FORMAT_A4, psstream::PORTRAIT);
00297   double pg_width = out.pagewidth();
00298   double pg_height = out.pageheight();
00299   double pg_margin = 40.0;
00300   double px = pg_width - 2.0 * pg_margin;
00301   double py = pg_height - 2.0 * pg_margin;
00302   double dx = g.x2 - g.x1;
00303   double dy = g.y2 - g.y1;
00304   double x0, y0, sx, sy;
00305   if (px * dy < py * dx)
00306   {
00307     x0 = pg_margin;
00308     sx = px;
00309     sy = px * dy / dx;
00310     y0 = 0.5 * (pg_height - sy);
00311   }
00312   else
00313   {
00314     y0 = pg_margin;
00315     sy = py;
00316     sx = py * dx / dy;
00317     x0 = 0.5 * (pg_width - sx);
00318   }
00319 
00320   const int n = 5;
00321   float level[n];
00322   color_type color[n] =
00323   {
00324     { 1.0, 0.5, 0.5 },
00325     { 1.0, 1.0, 0.5 },
00326     { 0.5, 1.0, 0.5 },
00327     { 0.5, 1.0, 1.0 },
00328     { 0.5, 0.5, 1.0 }
00329   };
00330 
00331 #if 0
00332   histeq(g.cx*g.cy, g.zz, n, level);
00333 #else
00334   for (int i = 0; i < n; ++i)
00335   {
00336     level[i] = g.z1 + (g.z2 - g.z1) * (i+1) / (n+1);
00337     // level[i] = g.z1 + (g.z2 - g.z1) * i / (n-1);
00338   }
00339 #endif
00340 
00341   out.newpage();
00342   out.colorimage(x0, y0, sx, sy, n, level, color, g.cx, g.cy, g.zz);
00343   delete[] g.zz;
00344 }
